Boolean.Name: DeviceRegistersValid
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if the current register set is valid and consistent.
Boolean.Description: Returns if the current register set is valid and consistent.

Command.Name: DeviceRegistersCheck
Command.ToolTip: Perform the validation of the current register set for consistency.
Command.Description: Perform the validation of the current register set for consistency.

Command.ToolTip: Starts registers streaming without checking for consistency.
Command.Description: Prepare the device for registers streaming without checking for consistency.

Command.ToolTip: Stops registers streaming.
Command.Description: Announce the end of registers streaming.

Command.Name: DeviceFeaturePersistenceStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts streaming of all streamable features.
Command.Description: Indicate to the device and GenICam XML to get ready for persisting of all streamable features.

Command.Name: DeviceFeaturePersistenceEnd
Command.ToolTip: Stops streaming of all streamable features.
Command.Description: Indicate to the device the end of feature persistence.

Integer.Name: WidthMin

Integer.Description: Minimum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Minimum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image.

Integer.Description: Vertical Offset of the image in areascan provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.ToolTip: Vertical Offset of the original image in areascan provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical Offset of the image in areascan provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Description: Vertical Offset of the image in areascan provided by the device (in pixels).

Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image of each Region.

Boolean.Name: AlternateReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Alternate readout direction every frame (i.e. ReverseY on and off).
Boolean.Description: Alternate readout direction every frame (i.e. ReverseY on and off).

Enumeration.Name: RegionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Region of interest to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Region of interest to control. The RegionSelector feature allows devices that are able to extract multiple regions out of an image, to configure the features of those individual regions independently.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0.

EnumEntry.Name: Region1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 1.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 2.

EnumEntry.Name: Region3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 3.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 3.

EnumEntry.Name: Scan3dExtraction0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction0 output from Region0.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction0 output from Region0.

EnumEntry.Name: Scan3dExtraction1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction1 output from Region1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction1 output from Region1.

EnumEntry.Name: Scan3dExtraction2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction2 output from Region2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction2 output from Region2.

EnumEntry.Name: Scan3dExtraction3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction3 output from Region3.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the Scan3dExtraction3 output from Region3.

Integer.Name: RegionIDValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns a unique Identifier value that corresponds to the selected Region.
Integer.Description: Returns a unique Identifier value that corresponds to the selected Region.

Enumeration.Name: RegionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disable the usage of the Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Disable the usage of the Region.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the usage of the Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the usage of the Region.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels) in Areascan Mode. In LineScan Mode this is the number of Profiles delivered in one Frame.

Integer.Name: HeightIncrement
Integer.ToolTip: Steps in which the height can be incremented/decremented.
Integer.Description: Steps in which the height can be incremented/decremented.

Integer.Name: OffsetYIncrement
Integer.ToolTip: Smallest value by which offset y can be incremented/decremented.
Integer.Description: Smallest value by which offset y can be incremented/decremented.

Integer.Name: OffsetXIncrement
Integer.ToolTip: Smallest value by which offset x can be incremented/decremented.
Integer.Description: Smallest value by which offset x can be incremented/decremented.

Integer.Name: WidthIncrement
Integer.ToolTip: Steps in which the width can be incremented/decremented.
Integer.Description: Steps in which the width can be incremented/decremented.

Integer.Name: MaxProfiles
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum number of profiles.
Integer.Description: Maximum number of profiles.

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: LinePitch
Integer.ToolTip: Total number of bytes between the starts of 2 consecutive lines.
Integer.Description: Total number of bytes between the starts of 2 consecutive lines. This feature is used to facilitate alignment of image data.

Enumeration.Name: ComponentSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects a component to activate/deactivate its data streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Selects a component to activate/deactivate its data streaming.

EnumEntry.Name: Intensity
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of intensity (monochrome or color) of the visible reflected light is controlled.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of intensity (monochrome or color) of the visible reflected light is controlled.

EnumEntry.Name: Range
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of range (distance) data is controlled.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of range (distance) data is controlled. The data produced may be only range (2.5D) or a point cloud giving the 3D coordinates depending on the Scan3dControl features.

EnumEntry.Name: Reflectance
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The reflected intensity acquired together with Range in a Linescan3D sensor acquiring a single linescan profile for each exposure of the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: The reflected intensity acquired together with Range in a Linescan3D sensor acquiring a single linescan profile for each exposure of the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: Scatter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The acquisition of data measuring how much light is scattered around the reflected light.
EnumEntry.Description: The acquisition of data measuring how much light is scattered around the reflected light. In processing this is used as an additional intensity image, often together with the standard intensity or reflectance.

Integer.Name: ComponentIDValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns a unique Identifier value that corresponds to type of the component selected by ComponentSelector.
Integer.Description: Returns a unique Identifier value that corresponds to type of the component selected by ComponentSelector.

Boolean.Name: ComponentEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the selected component streaming is active.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the selected component streaming is active.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter but combined in one single value.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.
Enumeration.Description: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum value that can be returned during the digitization process.
Integer.Description: Minimum value that can be returned during the digitization process. This corresponds to the darkest value of the camera. For color camera, this returns the smallest value that each color component can take.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum value that will be returned during the digitization process.
Integer.Description: Maximum value that will be returned during the digitization process. This corresponds to the brightest value of the camera. For color camera, this returns the biggest value that each color component can take.

Enumeration.Name: TestPatternGeneratorSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the sensor's test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the sensor's test pattern generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Generator
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the internal test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the internal test pattern generator.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: Ramp
EnumEntry.Description: Testpattern ramp generated by internal processing.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameCounter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: From Generator: framecounter as pixel intesity.
EnumEntry.Description: From Generator: framecounter as pixel intesity.

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalLineStaticBlack
EnumEntry.ToolTip: From Generator: Horizontal line, static, on black background.
EnumEntry.Description: From Generator: Horizontal line, static, on black background.

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalLineMovingBlack
EnumEntry.ToolTip: From Generator: Horizontal line, moving, on black background.
EnumEntry.Description: From Generator: Horizontal line, moving, on black background.

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalLineStaticOverlay
EnumEntry.ToolTip: From Generator: Horizontal line, static, superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: From Generator: Horizontal line, static, superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalLineMovingOverlay
EnumEntry.ToolTip: From Generator: Horizontal line, moving, superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: From Generator: Horizontal line, moving, superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Name: DiagonalLineStaticBlack
EnumEntry.ToolTip: From Generator: Diagonal line, static, on black background.
EnumEntry.Description: From Generator: Diagonal line, static, on black background.

EnumEntry.Name: DiagonalLineMovingBlack
EnumEntry.ToolTip: From Generator: Diagonal line, moving, on black background.
EnumEntry.Description: From Generator: Diagonal line, moving, on black background.

EnumEntry.Name: DiagonalLineStaticOverlay
EnumEntry.ToolTip: From Generator: Diagonal line, static, superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: From Generator: Diagonal line, static, superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Name: DiagonalLineMovingOverlay
EnumEntry.ToolTip: From Generator: Diagonal line, moving, superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: From Generator: Diagonal line, moving, superimposed on the live image.

Integer.Name: TestPatternValue
Integer.ToolTip: Value of the selected TestPattern.
Integer.Description: Value of the selected TestPattern.

Enumeration.Name: SoftwareSignalSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Software Signal features to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Software Signal features to control.

Command.Name: SoftwareSignalPulse
Command.ToolTip: Generates a pulse signal that can be used as a software trigger.
Command.Description: Generates a pulse signal that can be used as a software trigger.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector or the virtual line of the Transport Layer to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector or the virtual line of the Transport Layer to configure.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Input
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected physical line is used to Input an electrical signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected physical line is used to Input an electrical signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Output
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected physical line is used to Output an electrical signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected physical line is used to Output an electrical signal.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.

Boolean.Name: LineGlitchEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if the glitch filter is enabled.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if the glitch filter is enabled.

Integer.Name: LineGlitchValue
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value (in ns) which is applied to the line glitch filter.
Integer.Description: Sets the value (in ns) which is applied to the line glitch filter.

Boolean.Name: LineStretchEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if the stretcher is enabled.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if the stretcher is enabled.

Integer.Name: LineStretchValue
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value (in ns) which is applied to the stretcher.
Integer.Description: Sets the value (in ns) which is applied to the stretcher.

Integer.Name: LineStatusAll
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.
Integer.Description: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield. bit(0) : Line0 (IN1) bit(1) : Line1 (IN2) bit(2) : Line2 (Encoder-A) bit(3) : Line3 (Encoder-B) bit(4) : Line4 (Encoder-Z) bit(8) : Line5 (OUT1) bit(9) : Line6 (OUT2) bit(10): Line7 (Laser)

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the signal to Output on selected line.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the signal to Output on selected line.

Enumeration.Name: LineFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.

EnumEntry.Name: RS422
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Line is currently accepting or sending RS422 level signals.
EnumEntry.Description: The Line is currently accepting or sending RS422 level signals.

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select which bit of the User Output register will be set by User Output Value.
Enumeration.Description: Select which bit of the User Output register will be set by User Output Value.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.

Integer.Name: UserOutputValueAll
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register.
Integer.Description: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Encoder to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Encoder to configure.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderSourceA
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the signal which will be the source of the A input of the Encoder.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the signal which will be the source of the A input of the Encoder.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderSourceB
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the signal which will be the source of the B input of the Encoder.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the signal which will be the source of the B input of the Encoder.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects if the count of encoder uses FourPhase mode with jitter filtering or the HighResolution mode without jitter filtering.
Enumeration.Description: Selects if the count of encoder uses FourPhase mode with jitter filtering or the HighResolution mode without jitter filtering.

EnumEntry.Name: HighResolution
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter increments or decrements every quadrature phase for high resolution counting, but without jitter filtering.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter increments or decrements every quadrature phase for high resolution counting, but without jitter filtering.

EnumEntry.Name: FourPhase
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter increments or decrements 1 for every full quadrature cycle with jitter filtering.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter increments or decrements 1 for every full quadrature cycle with jitter filtering.

Integer.Name: EncoderDivider
Integer.ToolTip: Sets how many Encoder increment/decrements that are needed generate an Encoder output pulse signal.
Integer.Description: Sets how many Encoder increment/decrements that are needed generate an Encoder output pulse signal.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderOutputMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the conditions for the Encoder interface to generate a valid Encoder output signal.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the conditions for the Encoder interface to generate a valid Encoder output signal.

EnumEntry.Name: PositionUp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output pulses are generated at all new positions in the positive direction.
EnumEntry.Description: Output pulses are generated at all new positions in the positive direction. If the encoder reverses no output pulse are generated until it has again passed the position where the reversal started.

EnumEntry.Name: PositionDown
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output pulses are generated at all new positions in the negative direction.
EnumEntry.Description: Output pulses are generated at all new positions in the negative direction. If the encoder reverses no output pulse are generated until it has again passed the position where the reversal started.

EnumEntry.Name: DirectionUp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output pulses are generated at all position increments in the positive direction while ignoring negative direction motion.
EnumEntry.Description: Output pulses are generated at all position increments in the positive direction while ignoring negative direction motion.

EnumEntry.Name: DirectionDown
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output pulses are generated at all position increments in the negative direction while ignoring positive direction motion.
EnumEntry.Description: Output pulses are generated at all position increments in the negative direction while ignoring positive direction motion.

EnumEntry.Name: Motion
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output pulses are generated at all motion increments in both directions.
EnumEntry.Description: Output pulses are generated at all motion increments in both directions.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderResetSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Encoder.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Encoder.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderResetActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Activation mode of the Encoder Reset Source signal.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Activation mode of the Encoder Reset Source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelLow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the Encoder as long as the selected signal level is Low.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the Encoder as long as the selected signal level is Low.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the Encoder on the Rising Edge of the signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the Encoder on the Rising Edge of the signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the Encoder on the Falling Edge of the signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the Encoder on the Falling Edge of the signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the Encoder on the Falling or rising Edge of the selected signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the Encoder on the Falling or rising Edge of the selected signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelHigh
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the Encoder as long as the selected signal level is High.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the Encoder as long as the selected signal level is High.

Command.Name: EncoderReset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected Encoder and starts it.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected Encoder and starts it. The Encoder starts counting events immediately after the reset. EncoderReset can be used to reset the Encoder independently from the EncoderResetSource.

Integer.Name: EncoderValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reads or writes the current value of the position counter of the selected Encoder.
Integer.Description: Reads or writes the current value of the position counter of the selected Encoder.

Integer.Name: EncoderValueAtReset
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the value of the of the position counter of the selected Encoder when it was reset by a signal or by an explicit EncoderReset command.
Integer.Description: Reads the value of the of the position counter of the selected Encoder when it was reset by a signal or by an explicit EncoderReset command.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode to single frame
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the camera's acquisition mode to single frame

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode to continuous
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the camera's acquisition mode to continuous.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode to multi frame
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the camera's acquisition mode to multi frame.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStopMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls how the AcquisitionStop command and the acquisition stopped using a trigger (e.g.
Enumeration.Description: Controls how the AcquisitionStop command and the acquisition stopped using a trigger (e.g. AcquisitionActive, FrameBurstActive, FrameActive or FrameEnd trigger), ends an ongoing frame. This feature is mainly used in Linescan devices where each line in a frame is acquired sequentially.

EnumEntry.Name: Complete
EnumEntry.ToolTip: When stopped during a frame, the device will continue acquisition of lines until the specified Height is reached to deliver a complete default size frame.
EnumEntry.Description: When stopped during a frame, the device will continue acquisition of lines until the specified Height is reached to deliver a complete default size frame. Note that if each line is triggered from an external source and this line trigger stops no frame is delivered, and an AcquisitionAbort is needed.

EnumEntry.Name: ImmediateWithPadding
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Acquisition stops immediately even during a frame but the remaining of the frame will be padded with data to deliver a complete default Height frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Acquisition stops immediately even during a frame but the remaining of the frame will be padded with data to deliver a complete default Height frame.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStatusSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing the capture of a frame burst.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing the capture of a frame burst.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing the capture of a frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing the capture of a frame.

EnumEntry.Name: LineActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a line.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a line.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector.
Boolean.Description: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the number of frames acquired in the multiframe acquisition mode
Integer.Description: This value sets the number of frames acquired in the multiframe acquisition mode

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the number of frames acquired in the Continuous acquisition mode
Integer.Description: This value sets the number of frames acquired in the Continuous acquisition mode

Integer.Name: AcquisitionDroppedFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: The number of internal dropped Frames.
Integer.Description: The number of internal dropped Frames.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: When set to true, you can manually adjust the Acquisition Frame Rate
Boolean.Description: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate. Otherwise, the acquisition rate is implicitly controlled by the combination of other features like ExposureTime

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionLineRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: When set to true, you can manually adjust the Acquisition Line Rate
Boolean.Description: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate. Otherwise, the acquisition rate is implicitly controlled by the combination of other features like ExposureTime

Float.Name: AcquisitionLineRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the rate (in Hertz) at which the Lines in a Frame are captured
Float.Description: Controls the rate (in Hertz) at which the Lines in a Frame are captured

Integer.Name: TriggersEnable
Integer.ToolTip: Reads which triggers are enabled now.
Integer.Description: Reads which triggers are enabled now.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that ends the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that ends the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition. AcquisitionBurstFrameCount controls the length of each burst unless a FrameBurstEnd trigger is active. The total number of frames captured is also conditioned by AcquisitionFrameCount if AcquisitionMode is MultiFrame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger ending the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger ending the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger ending the capture of one frame (mainly used in line scan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger ending the capture of one frame (mainly used in line scan mode).

EnumEntry.Name: LineStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one Line of a Frame (mainly used in line scan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one Line of a Frame (mainly used in line scan mode).

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart.
EnumEntry.Description: The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart.

EnumEntry.Name: TimedCorrected
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime considering ExposureTimeGain and ExposureTimeOffset. (The formula is SensorExposureTime = ExposureTime * ExposureTimeGain + ExposureTimeOffset)
EnumEntry.Description: The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime considering ExposureTimeGain and ExposureTimeOffset. (The formula is SensorExposureTime = ExposureTime * ExposureTimeGain + ExposureTimeOffset)

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time. This controls the duration the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Float.Name: ExposureTimeGain
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time gain.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time offset. This controls the factor which with which the ExposureTime should be multiplied when ExposureMode=TimedCorrected.

Float.Name: ExposureTimeOffset
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time offset.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time offset. This controls the duration which is added to the ExposureTime when ExposureMode=TimedCorrected.

Enumeration.Name: MultiSlopeMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls multi-slope exposure state
Enumeration.Description: Controls multi-slope exposure state

Integer.Name: MultiSlopeKneePointCount
Integer.ToolTip: The number of knee-points as well as the number of additional exposure slopes used for multi-slope exposure
Integer.Description: The number of knee-points as well as the number of additional exposure slopes used for multi-slope exposure

Integer.Name: MultiSlopeKneePointSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the parameters for controlling a kneepoint during multi-slope exposure
Integer.Description: Selects the parameters for controlling a kneepoint during multi-slope exposure

Float.Name: MultiSlopeExposureLimit
Float.ToolTip: Percent of the ExposureTime at a certain knee-point of multi-slope exposure
Float.Description: Percent of the ExposureTime at a certain knee-point of multi-slope exposure

Float.Name: MultiSlopeSaturationThreshold
Float.ToolTip: The percentage of the full saturation that is applied at a certain knee-point of a multi-slope exposure
Float.Description: The percentage of the full saturation that is applied at a certain knee-point of a multi-slope exposure. The limits are sensor-specific and might not span the whole range of 0..100%. In principle, setting this value to 100% would effectively disable this knee-point, while setting this value to 0% would effectively start exposure at this knee-point.

Enumeration.Name: CounterSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Counter to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Counter to configure.

Enumeration.Name: CounterTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the source to start the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the source to start the Counter.

Enumeration.Name: CounterTriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Activation mode Event Source signal.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Activation mode Event Source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelLow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter as long as the selected signal level is Low.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter as long as the selected signal level is Low.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter on the Rising Edge of the signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter on the Rising Edge of the signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter on the Falling Edge of the signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter on the Falling Edge of the signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter on the Falling or rising Edge of the selected signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter on the Falling or rising Edge of the selected signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelHigh
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter as long as the selected signal level is High.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter as long as the selected signal level is High.

Enumeration.Name: CounterEventSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select the events that will be the source to increment the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Select the events that will be the source to increment the Counter.

Enumeration.Name: CounterEventActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Activation mode Event Source signal.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Activation mode Event Source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts on the Rising Edge of the signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts on the Rising Edge of the signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts on the Falling Edge of the signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts on the Falling Edge of the signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts on the Falling or rising Edge of the selected signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts on the Falling or rising Edge of the selected signal.

Enumeration.Name: CounterResetSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter.

Enumeration.Name: CounterResetActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Activation mode of the Counter Reset Source signal.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Activation mode of the Counter Reset Source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelLow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter as long as the selected signal level is Low.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter as long as the selected signal level is Low.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter on the Rising Edge of the signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter on the Rising Edge of the signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter on the Falling Edge of the signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter on the Falling Edge of the signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter on the Falling or rising Edge of the selected signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter on the Falling or rising Edge of the selected signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelHigh
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter as long as the selected signal level is High.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter as long as the selected signal level is High.

Command.Name: CounterReset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it. The counter starts counting events immediately after the reset unless a Counter trigger is active. CounterReset can be used to reset the Counter independently from the CounterResetSource. To disable the counter temporarily, set CounterEventSource to Off.

Integer.Name: CounterValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter.
Integer.Description: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter.

Integer.Name: CounterValueAtReset
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.
Integer.Description: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.

Integer.Name: CounterDuration
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated.
Integer.Description: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated.

Enumeration.Name: CounterStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the current status of the Counter.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter is waiting for a start trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter is waiting for a start trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter is counting for the specified duration.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter is counting for the specified duration.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterCompleted
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter reached the CounterDuration count.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter reached the CounterDuration count.

EnumEntry.Name: CounterOverflow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The counter reached its maximum possible count.
EnumEntry.Description: The counter reached its maximum possible count.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dExtractionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the 3DExtraction processing module to control (if multiple ones are present).
Enumeration.Description: Selects the 3DExtraction processing module to control (if multiple ones are present).

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dExtractionSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the sensor's data source region for 3D Extraction module.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the sensor's data source region for 3D Extraction module.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dExtractionMethod
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the method for extracting 3D from the input sensor data.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the method for extracting 3D from the input sensor data.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dExtractionThresholdSlopeMode
Enumeration.Description: Controls the Threshold mode in FIR algorithm.

EnumEntry.Name: Single
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Single - only positive edge of FIR is used

EnumEntry.Name: Symmetric
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Symmetric - positive and negative edge with symmetric threshold is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Manual
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Manual- positive and negative threshold can be adjusted manually.

Integer.Name: Scan3dExtractionThresholdSlope
Integer.ToolTip: Extraction slope threshold value for selected region
Integer.Description: Extraction slope threshold value for selected region

Integer.Name: Scan3dExtractionThresholdSlope2
Integer.ToolTip: Extraction Threshold Slope 2 value for selected region
Integer.Description: Extraction Threshold Slope 2 bottom value for selected region

Integer.Name: Scan3dExtractionThresholdIntensity
Integer.ToolTip: Extraction intensity threshold value for selected region
Integer.Description: Extraction intensity threshold value for selected region

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dMultiPeakMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Multi Peak mode
Enumeration.Description: Defines how to handle the occurrence of multiple peaks

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dMultiPeakSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects a specific peak in MultiPeakMode SetFirst to activate/deactivate it for streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Selects a specific peak in MultiPeakMode SetFirst to activate/deactivate it for streaming.

Boolean.Name: Scan3dMultiPeakEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the selected peak is active in streaming.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the selected peak is active in streaming.

Integer.Name: Scan3dValidationWidthMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum width of valid intensity distribution in 3D mode
Integer.Description: Minimum width of valid intensity distribution in 3D mode. Below this value the found peak is evaluated as invalid. This feature is available for Max/Threshold/COG.

Integer.Name: Scan3dValidationWidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of valid intensity distribution in 3D mode
Integer.Description: If the intensity of the signal is above the threshold for more lines as given in this parameter the signal is evaluated as invalid for a peak. This feature is available for Max/Threshold/COG.

Integer.Name: Scan3dValidationSlopeMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum slope of valid intensity distribution in 3D mode
Integer.Description: Minimum slope of valid intensity distribution in 3D mode. Below this value the found peak is evaluated as invalid. This feature is available only for FIR.

Integer.Name: Scan3dValidationSlopeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum slope of valid intensity distribution in 3D mode
Integer.Description: Maximum slope of valid intensity distribution in 3D mode. Above this value the found peak is evaluated as invalid. This feature is available only for FIR.

Integer.Name: Scan3dValidationSumMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum sum of intensity that is considered valid for intensity distribution in 3D mode.
Integer.Description: Minimum sum of intensity that is considered valid for intensity distribution in 3D mode.

Integer.Name: Scan3dValidationSumMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum sum of intensity that is considered valid for intensity distribution in 3D mode.
Integer.Description: Maximum sum of intensity that is considered valid for intensity distribution in 3D mode.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dFilterMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Filter Mode
Enumeration.Description: For non FIR mode this is a smoothing filter that can be enabled/disabled. In FIR mode this is the derivative filter.

Integer.Name: Scan3dFilterSizeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum Filter Size supported
Integer.Description: Maximum Filter Size supported

Integer.Name: Scan3dFilterSize
Integer.ToolTip: Filter Size Peak Fitting. Adapt to laser peak width on sensor.
Integer.Description: Filter Size Peak Fitting. Adapt to laser peak width on sensor.

Integer.Name: Scan3dFilterGain
Integer.ToolTip: Gain used for the applied coefficients.
Integer.Description: Gain used for the applied coefficients.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dFilterCoefficientSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan3dFilterCoefficientSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects a specific filter coefficients

Float.Name: AppliedFilterCoefficientValue
Float.ToolTip: Applied Filter Coefficient Value
Float.Description: Applied Filter Coefficient Value

Float.Name: Scan3dFilterCoefficientValue
Float.ToolTip: Filter Coefficient Value
Float.Description: Filter Coefficient Value

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dDistanceUnit
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the unit used when delivering (calibrated) distance data.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the unit used when delivering (calibrated) distance data.

EnumEntry.Name: Pixel
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Distance values are given as a multiple of the size of a pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: Distance values are given as a multiple of the size of a pixel.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dCoordinateSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the individual coordinates in the vectors for 3D information/transformation.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the individual coordinates in the vectors for 3D information/transformation.

Float.Name: Scan3dCoordinateScale
Float.ToolTip: Scale factor when transforming a pixel from relative coordinates to world coordinates.
Float.Description: Scale factor when transforming a pixel from relative coordinates to world coordinates.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dCoordinateMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the coordinate mode.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the coordinate mode.

Float.Name: Scan3dCoordinateOffset
Float.ToolTip: Offset when transforming a pixel from relative coordinates to world coordinates.
Float.Description: Offset when transforming a pixel from relative coordinates to world coordinates.

Boolean.Name: Scan3dInvalidDataFlag
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the definition of a non-valid flag value in the data stream.
Boolean.Description: Enables the definition of a non-valid flag value in the data stream. Using a Scan3dInvalidDataValue may give processing penalties due to special handling.

Float.Name: Scan3dInvalidDataValue
Float.ToolTip: Value which identifies a non-valid pixel if Scan3dInvalidDataFlag is enabled.
Float.Description: Value which identifies a non-valid pixel if Scan3dInvalidDataFlag is enabled.

Float.Name: Scan3dAxisMin
Float.ToolTip: Minimum valid transmitted coordinate value of the selected Axis.
Float.Description: Minimum valid transmitted coordinate value of the selected Axis.

Float.Name: Scan3dAxisMax
Float.ToolTip: Maximum valid transmitted coordinate value of the selected Axis.
Float.Description: Maximum valid transmitted coordinate value of the selected Axis.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dCoordinateSystem
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the Coordinate system to use for the device.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the Coordinate system to use for the device.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dCoordinateSystemReference
Enumeration.ToolTip: Defines coordinate system reference location.
Enumeration.Description: Defines coordinate system reference location.

EnumEntry.Name: Anchor
EnumEntry.Description: Default value. Original fixed reference. The coordinate system fixed relative the camera reference point marker is used.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dOutputMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the Calibration and data organization of the device and the coordinates transmitted.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the Calibration and data organization of the device and the coordinates transmitted.

EnumEntry.Name: UncalibratedC
EnumEntry.Description: Uncalibrated 2.5D Depth map. The distance data does not represent a physical unit and may be non-linear. The data is a 2.5D range map only.

Enumeration.Name: Scan3dColumnMaskSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the used column mask for statistics.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the used column mask for statistics.

Enumeration.Name: ColumnMaskSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the 3DExtraction processing module to control (if multiple ones are present).
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Column Mask that can be used in Region Tracking and Region Search.

Integer.Name: ColumnMaskColumnIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Selects a specific column state
Integer.Description: Selects a specific column state.

Enumeration.Name: ColumnMaskColumnState
Enumeration.ToolTip: Current state of the selected column
Enumeration.Description: Current state of the selected column.

Integer.Name: ColumnMaskGroupIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Defines the range of consecutive masked columns to read out
Integer.Description: Defines the range of consecutive masked columns to read out.

Command.Name: ColumnMaskGroupReadCommand
Command.ToolTip: Read back the Column Mask of element number into Column Group Start and Column Group End
Command.Description: Read back the Column Mask of element number into Column Group Start and Column Group End

Integer.Name: ColumnMaskGroupStart
Integer.ToolTip: Column Mask start value.
Integer.Description: Column Mask start value. Related to the pixel in the ROI (X-Window)

Integer.Name: ColumnMaskGroupEnd
Integer.ToolTip: Column Mask end value of a range
Integer.Description: Column Mask end value of a range. Related to the pixel in the ROI (X-Window)

Command.Name: ColumnMaskGroupEnable
Command.ToolTip: Activates the Column Mask for all columns between Column Group Start and Column Group End
Command.Description: Activates the Column Mask for all columns between Column Group Start and Column Group End

Command.Name: ColumnMaskGroupDisable
Command.ToolTip: Deactivates the Column Mask for all columns between Column Group Start and Column Group End
Command.Description: Deactivates the Column Mask for all columns between Column Group Start and Column Group End

Enumeration.Name: RegionTrackingControllerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Region Tracking Controller
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Region Tracking Controller

Enumeration.Name: RegionTrackingSourceRegion
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Source Region where tracking should be applied
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Source Region where tracking should be applied

Enumeration.Name: RegionTrackingStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: RegionTrackingStatus.
Enumeration.Description: The current state of the Region Tracking Controller

Enumeration.Name: RegionTrackingMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: RegionTrackingMode
Enumeration.Description: Selects the mode of the region tracking, this is the axis or axes along which will be tracked.

Enumeration.Name: RegionTrackingLostMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: RegionTrackingLostMode
Enumeration.Description: Defines the behavior that should occur when the laser line is detected as lost.

Integer.Name: RegionTrackingLostCount
Integer.ToolTip: Counts of periods after lost is detected
Integer.Description: Counts of periods (RegionTrackingUpdatePeriod) after detected lost. When the counter expires the lost will be reported

Integer.Name: RegionTrackingLostDefaultOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Region Tracking Offset Y in Case of Lost
Integer.Description: This value is applied as the Offset Y for the tracked region when tracking lost ist detected

Enumeration.Name: RegionTrackingAlgorithm
Enumeration.ToolTip: RegionTrackingAlgorithm.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the orientation and method of the tracked laser line in the region.

EnumEntry.Name: Range
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Take the middle of range values and add search offset
EnumEntry.Description: The location where the found laser line should be placed in region as actual=(min+max)/2+algorithmOffsetY

EnumEntry.Name: Min
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Take the minimum of range values and add search offset
EnumEntry.Description: The location where the found laser line should be placed in the minimum of the region. Value as actual=min+algorithmOffsetY

EnumEntry.Name: Max
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Take the maximum of range values and add search offset
EnumEntry.Description: The location where the found laser line should be placed in region in the maximum of the region. Value as actual=max+algorithmOffsetY

EnumEntry.Name: Mean
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Take the mean of range values and add search offset
EnumEntry.Description: The location where the found laser line should be placed in region, calculated from them mean value of all valid detected pixels

Integer.Name: RegionTrackingAlgorithmOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Region Tracking Algorithm Offset Y
Integer.Description: Depending on the selected algorithm, the laser line is held by the control at a certain position in the region. This offset is applied to the detected position to move the resulting position in the desired way.

Integer.Name: RegionTrackingAlgorithmMinY
Integer.ToolTip: Region Tracking Algorithm Min Y
Integer.Description: The minimum position up to which the region can be moved by tracking. If the region would reach or fall below this position, the tracked region stops at this position and the status changes to clipping.

Integer.Name: RegionTrackingAlgorithmMaxY
Integer.ToolTip: Region Tracking Algorithm Max Y
Integer.Description: The maximum position up to which the region can be moved by tracking. If the region would reach or exceed this position, the tracked region stops at this position and the status changes to clipping.

Enumeration.Name: RegionTrackingTriggerStart
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to start the tracking.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to start the tracking.

Enumeration.Name: RegionTrackingTriggerEnd
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to end the tracking.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to end the tracking.

Integer.Name: RegionTrackingValidPixel
Integer.ToolTip: Region Tracking Valid Pixel
Integer.Description: If less than this number of valid range values are found within the respective recorded image, the controller changes to the Lost state after the number of Cust::RegionTrackingLostCount further periods has elapsed.

Float.Name: RegionTrackingTermP
Float.ToolTip: RegionTrackingTermP
Float.Description: The P-element consists exclusively of a proportional part of the gain of the control deviation. With its output signal it is proportional to the input signal.

Float.Name: RegionTrackingTermI
Float.ToolTip: RegionTrackingTermI
Float.Description: The I-element acts by time integration of the control deviation e(t) on the manipulated variable with the weighting by the setup time

Float.Name: RegionTrackingTermD
Float.ToolTip: RegionTrackingTermD
Float.Description: The D-element is a differentiator which is only used as a controller in connection with controllers with P and/or I behavior. It does not react to the amount of the control deviation e(t), but only to its rate of change.

Float.Name: RegionTrackingUpdatePeriod
Float.ToolTip: RegionTrackingUpdatePeriod
Float.Description: The PID closed-loop controller is updated after each control cycle, which is defined by this update period

Enumeration.Name: RegionSearchControllerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Region Search Controller
Enumeration.Description: Selects the instance of the Region Search Controller

Enumeration.Name: RegionSearchMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: RegionSearchMode
Enumeration.Description: Selects the search mode, this is the axis or axes along which will be searched.

Enumeration.Name: RegionSearchStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: RegionSearchStatus.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the status after the search has been performed.

EnumEntry.Name: Undetermined
EnumEntry.Description: Region Search has never been performed.

Integer.Name: RegionSearchValidPixel
Integer.ToolTip: Region Search Valid Pixel
Integer.Description: Necessary number of valid pixels for successful detection of the laser line position. If the implicit image acquisition for the search contains fewer valid pixels, the search is classified as unsuccessful.

Integer.Name: RegionSearchHeight
Integer.ToolTip: RegionSearchHeight
Integer.Description: The height of the region within the search is performed. The location of the region is determined by Cust::RegionSearchOffsetY

Integer.Name: RegionSearchOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: RegionSearchOffsetY
Integer.Description: The top edge of the region whose height is given by Cust::RegionSearchHeight within which the search is performed.

Enumeration.Name: RegionSearchAlgorithm
Enumeration.ToolTip: RegionSearchAlgorithm.
Enumeration.Description: Determines how the laser line is placed in the region after it is found.

EnumEntry.Name: Range
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Take the middle of range values and add search offset
EnumEntry.Description: The target position as result of the laser line search is calculated from the determined minimum and maximum values of the range as actual=(min+max)/2+algorithmOffsetY

EnumEntry.Name: Min
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Take the minimum of range values and add search offset
EnumEntry.Description: TThe target position as result of the laser line search is calculated from detected minimum of the range values as actual=min+algorithmOffsetY

EnumEntry.Name: Max
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Take the maximum of range values and add search offset
EnumEntry.Description: The target position as result of the laser line search is calculated from detected maximum of the range values as actual=max+algorithmOffsetY

EnumEntry.Name: Mean
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Take the mean of range values and add search offset
EnumEntry.Description: The target position as result of the laser line search is calculated from them mean value of all valid detected pixels

Integer.Name: RegionSearchAlgorithmOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: RegionSearchAlgorithmOffsetY
Integer.Description: Depending on the selected algorithm, the laser line is held by the control at a certain position in the region. With this value, the target position within the region can modify this position.

Enumeration.Name: RegionSearchTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to start the search.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to start the search.

Command.Name: RegionSearchExecute
Command.ToolTip: Triggers Region Search immediately.
Command.Description: Triggers Region Search immediately

Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Integer.Description: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device. This Operation is executed when the FileOperationExecute feature is called.

EnumEntry.Name: Open
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Opens the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Opens the file selected by FileSelector in the device. The access mode in which the file is opened is selected by FileOpenMode.

EnumEntry.Name: Close
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Closes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Closes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Read
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Reads FileAccessLength bytes from the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset into FileAccessBuffer.
EnumEntry.Description: Reads FileAccessLength bytes from the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset into FileAccessBuffer.

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Writes FileAccessLength bytes taken from the FileAccessBuffer into the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset.
EnumEntry.Description: Writes FileAccessLength bytes taken from the FileAccessBuffer into the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset.

EnumEntry.Name: Delete
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Deletes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Deletes the file selected by FileSelector in the device. Note that deleting a device file should not remove the associated FileSelector entry to allow future operation on this file.

Enumeration.Name: FileOpenMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Read

EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects read-only open mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.ToolTip: This mode selects write-only open mode.
EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects write-only open mode.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadWrite
EnumEntry.ToolTip: This mode selects read and write open mode.
EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects read and write open mode.

Integer.Description: Controls the length of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer

Integer.Description: Controls the offset of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer
